posts.post_title: c1909 Cy Young Postcard "On the Hunter" SGC 1.5
posts.post_content:
c1909 Cy Young Postcard "On the Hunter" SGC 1.5

$400 delivered with a no fee payment

If you are interested, do not reply here. Send me a PM or email.

There are scammers who appear to be contacting interested parties who post in BST listings, trying to divert payments their way.
Always liked this card.  The horses tail seems a little small.   If I didn’t have one already I’d make an offer.
